page.title: 02DUXMORE FARM
page.content: Duxmore farm is situated 2 miles south of Havenstreet, and 5 miles east of Newport. It is owned by Mr.Kennerly who is not an Islander, but was born in Canada. As far back as he can remember farming has been in his family. His wife and children help him with the farm chores. The farmhouse is two cottages and was built in 1880. He owns 300 acres of land, and grows wheat and barley. He has 90 milking cows which are Fresians and 150 beef and young dairy cattle. He prouces milk, beef, wheat and barley. He makes use of the surrounding woodland, making wooden stakes from oak trees. He enjoys working on hot days, but not when it's wet and cold. He has two farm helpers and a milkmaid.
